    • Field Detail

      • MAX_REQUIRES_DEPTH

        public static int MAX_REQUIRES_DEPTH
        Maximum allowed depth of dependency chain in bindings (default 10). Used to protect against cyclic dependencies.

      • MAX_BINDING_DEPTH

        public static int MAX_BINDING_DEPTH
        Maximum allowed depth of dependency chain in bindings (default 10). Used to protect against cyclic dependencies.

      • isInternal

        public boolean isInternal()
        A task or decomposition class is internal if its id starts with an underscore. Can be overridden with @internal property. Internal types are suppressed in various places, such as history printing, ttsay, etc. Also the default key values that control plugins, such as @ProposeHow are false for internal tasks, rather than true.

        protected java.io.PrintStream getOut()
